ComObjActive().description: Retrieves a running object that has been registered with OLE.

ComObjArray().description: Creates a SafeArray for use with COM.

ComObjConnect().description: Connects the object's event sources to functions with a given prefix.

ComObjError().description: Enables or disables notification of COM errors.

ComObjFlags().description: Retrieves or changes flags which control a COM wrapper object's behaviour.

ComObjGet().description: Returns a reference to an object provided by a COM component.

ComObjQuery().description: Queries a COM object for an interface or service.

ComObjType().description: Retrieves type information from a COM object.

ComObjValue().description: Retrieves the value or pointer stored in a COM wrapper object.
